thread.title: Revealed: Garda accused of separate sex assaults on woman and young girl now plans to sue state
thread.title_full: Revealed: Garda accused of separate sex assaults on woman and young girl now plans to sue state

title: Revealed: Garda accused of separate sex assaults on woman and young girl now plans to sue state
text: Sunday 15 January 2017 Revealed: Garda accused of separate sex assaults on woman and young girl now plans to sue state The allegations involved are 'potentially very serious for the entire force', source claims Cathal McMahon and Ralph Riegel Published 15/01/2017 | 02:30 0 Comments Share Revealed: Garda accused of separate sex assaults on woman and young girl now plans to sue state Independent.ie The Gardai have been rocked by a crisis involving two alleged sex assaults by a serving member of the force, including one against a young girl. http://www.independent.ie/irish-news/news/revealed-garda-accused-of-separate-sex-assaults-on-woman-and-young-girl-now-plans-to-sue-state-35367979.html http://www.independent.ie/incoming/article35368061.ece/cb01e/AUTOCROP/h342/garda-Jacket.jpg The garda scandal began when the woman (inset) accused a serving garda of rape The Gardai have been rocked by a crisis involving two alleged sex assaults by a serving member of the force, including one against a young girl. Share Revealed: Garda accused of separate sex assaults on woman and young girl now plans to sue state Independent.ie The Gardai have been rocked by a crisis involving two alleged sex assaults by a serving member of the force, including one against a young girl. http://www.independent.ie/irish-news/news/revealed-garda-accused-of-separate-sex-assaults-on-woman-and-young-girl-now-plans-to-sue-state-35367979.html
